mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Regarding the possible sale of Short's land to the Bankhead family or another purchaser. Comments on current land transactions near Monticello and events in Washington. James Monroe will be a valuable addition to government councils.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
Monroe, James, 1758-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1811 May 17, Monticello [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William Short], n.p.
